text: Hey AJ! Just saw this and figured I’d check in. This definitely isn’t out of the question. How would you feel about the description appearing below the field rather than above it:
that would work as well as long as the spacing between the fields makes it so that it doesnt look like it belongs to the field below
i think ideally between the label and the field is more common place but if its impossible for the time, then the other is a good alternative

Not necessarily impossible! The ‘description below the field’ pattern is just how we address this kind of need in HubSpot in other apps. The component we use would also use the same spacing that you’re used to, so it would clearly be attached to the field above it, and not to the one below.
So, continuing to do so in this spot would ensure your module form continues to fit within the rest of our ecosystem.
We’ll continue to look into it. Thanks for letting us know!
